it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn

Interface TurnDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionDataSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullTurnDataSource, ScriptedDataSource, TurnDataSourceImpl

    public interface TurnDataSource
extends ActionDataSource
    A source of additional data for any Effect, Action or Interaction that may require them during a turn. This class can require inputs to humans through the network.

    • Method Summary

                  throws UndoException
        Requests and retrieves an action from a given list
